extDescription: AI-Powered Smart Bookmark Manager with Claude API

sidebar.duplicateName: This name already exists, please use a different name
sidebar.editHint: Click a folder to edit. System folders cannot be edited.
sidebar.cannotMoveToChild: Cannot move a folder into its own child folder

search.semanticPlaceholder: AI semantic search... try 'articles about machine learning'

detail.title: Bookmark Details
detail.selectHint: Select a bookmark to view details
detail.enrichTooltip: AI analyze: generate summary and tags

snapshot.levelNotAvailable: Upgrade snapshot level to unlock this tab

options.title: Settings
options.subtitle: ScamLens Configuration
options.proxyModeDesc: Use official service, pay as you go, no technical background needed
options.customModeDesc: Use your own Claude API Key, direct API calls
options.bestModelIncluded: Best model included with all plans
options.upgradeUnavailable: Upgrade service coming soon, stay tuned!
options.apiKeyHelp: Get your API key from console.anthropic.com
options.apiKeyHelpOpenAI: Get your API key from platform.openai.com
options.modelHelp: Enter the model name supported by your provider
options.verifyFailed: Verification failed - invalid API Key or connection error
options.verifyErrorInvalidKey: Invalid API Key. Please check if it is correct, expired, or revoked
options.verifyErrorForbidden: Insufficient permissions. Please verify this key has model access enabled
options.verifyErrorRateLimit: Too many requests. Please try again later
options.verifyErrorBaseUrl: Base URL is required to connect to this provider
options.verifyErrorNetwork: Network connection failed. Check your network or Base URL
options.verifyTroubleshoot: Check: 1. API Key is correct 2. Account has balance 3. Network is working 4. Base URL is correct
options.apiKeyEmpty: Please enter an API Key first
options.clearAllDataDesc: Delete all bookmarks, folders, and settings. This cannot be undone.
options.clearAllDataConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete ALL data? This is irreversible. Type "DELETE" to confirm.
options.passwordTooShort: Password must be at least 8 characters
options.passwordChanged: Password changed successfully. Please log in again.
options.deleteAccountWarning: This will permanently delete your account and all associated data (bookmarks, backups, subscriptions). This action cannot be undone.
options.deleteAccountConfirm: This will permanently delete your account. Type "DELETE" to confirm.

dedupe.title: Bookmark Analyzer
dedupe.initialDesc: Intelligently scan your bookmarks to detect duplicate URLs, similar content, and related sites to help you organize.
dedupe.noResults: Analysis complete! Your bookmarks are well organized.
dedupe.relatedSitesDesc: Different regional sites from the same brand/organization
dedupe.checkRelated: Discover regional sites from same organization

help.title: User Guide
help.step1Desc: Right-click any webpage and select "Save to ScamLens" or use Ctrl+Shift+S
help.step2Desc: Auto-extracts content, generates AI summary & tags, creates webpage snapshots
help.step3Desc: Type keywords in search box. Click ✨ to switch to semantic search mode
help.step4Desc: Create folders in the left panel, drag bookmarks to organize
help.step5Desc: Let AI analyze all bookmarks and auto-create categorized folders
help.step6Desc: View and manage all tags, filter bookmarks by tag
help.step7Desc: Import from Chrome/Safari, export as HTML or JSON
help.step8Desc: Periodically checks if links are still active, recover from snapshots
help.step9Desc: Auto-detect duplicate bookmarks, batch merge or delete
help.step10Desc: Select multiple bookmarks to move, delete, or export in bulk
help.step11Desc: Browse bookmark history chronologically, switch between card and timeline views
help.step12Desc: Encrypt and backup bookmark data to the cloud, restore across devices

import.fromChromeDesc: Import all bookmarks from browser bookmark bar
import.fromSafariDesc: In Safari, go to File → Export Bookmarks, then select the exported HTML file
import.fromFileDesc: Support HTML or JSON bookmark files
import.hint: Import won't overwrite existing bookmarks, duplicates will be skipped

export.asJSONDesc: Full data backup, can be restored later
export.asHTMLDesc: Universal bookmark format, import to other browsers
export.hint: JSON includes full data, HTML is more compatible

tags.selectHint: Select a tag to view bookmarks
tags.deleteConfirm: Delete tag "{{name}}"? This will remove the tag from all bookmarks.
tags.selectTarget: Click target tag to complete merge
tags.hint: Click tags to edit, use the merge button to combine similar tags

bookmarks.title: No Bookmarks Yet
bookmarks.tip3: Or click below to import existing bookmarks

search.title: No Results Found
search.description: Try different keywords or broader search
search.tip1: Use keywords instead of full sentences

folder.description: This folder has no bookmarks yet

tags.title: No Tags
tags.description: Tags are auto-generated when saving pages

timeline.title: Timeline is Empty
timeline.description: Your timeline will appear after saving bookmarks

classify.title: AI Auto Classify
classify.subtitle: Intelligently organize your bookmarks
classify.welcomeDesc: AI will analyze all your bookmarks and automatically create folders based on content. You can drag and drop to adjust the results before applying.
classify.aiWillAnalyze: AI will analyze titles, summaries, and tags to intelligently classify
classify.noBookmarks: No bookmarks yet, please add some first
classify.saveSuccess: Classification saved successfully! You can close this page now.
classify.resultDesc: Created {{folders}} category folders for you. Drag bookmarks to adjust.

backup.title: Cloud Backup
backup.loginRequired: Please sign in to use cloud backup
backup.passwordPlaceholder: Enter a password to encrypt your backup
backup.passwordReminder: Remember this password — it's needed to restore your backup
backup.hintDesc: A hint to help you remember your password. Do not write the password itself.

errors.USAGE_LIMIT_REACHED: Monthly AI usage limit reached, please upgrade your plan
errors.API_KEY_REQUIRED: Please configure Claude API Key first
errors.AI_NOT_LOGGED_IN: Please login first to use AI features
errors.AI_NOT_CONFIGURED: Please configure your API Key in Settings

welcome.title: Welcome to ScamLens
welcome.subtitle: Your AI-powered bookmark manager that saves, organizes, and protects your web.
welcome.feature_aiSummary_desc: Automatically generate summaries and tags for every bookmark.
welcome.feature_healthCheck_desc: Monitor your bookmarks for dead links and broken pages.
welcome.feature_snapshot_desc: Save full-page snapshots so you never lose content.
welcome.feature_semanticSearch_desc: Find bookmarks by meaning, not just keywords.
welcome.readyDesc: Create a free account to unlock AI features and cloud sync, or jump straight into browsing.
welcome.tipShortcut: Tip: Use Ctrl+Shift+S (Cmd+Shift+S on Mac) to save any page instantly.
